choices: Suddenly Kyle hears a noise coming from the upstairs bedroom
Suddenly Kyle here's a noise coming from the downstairs basement
Kyle goes through the night without incident
Kyle gets the feeling like he's being watched
1.content:
The car made a screeching sound as it turned onto the driveway Kyle sat at the steering wheel driving his bright red sedan, Kyle was 25 he had just moved out from the big city and decided to make his life in his parents house, Kyle was also former military who had been discharged after being shot in the head well on a tour in Afghanistan with his Canadian regiment, Kyle had been on 6 Tuers to Afghanistan and 4 Tuers to Kandahar he had advanced weapons training and was a martial arts expert, he had made it up to the rank of Staff Sergeant, Kyle considered himself to be a Canadian, yes he and his family were Born in The United States but Kyle was raised in Canada by his uncle as a kid, The car came to a halt Kyle opened The driver side of the door and stepped out.
"there it is" Kyle said "Home I never thought it see this place again, things have changed since I last saw it" Kyle began to unload his car, A big German Shepherd jumped out, it was Milo Kyle's dog "come on boy" Kyle walked up to the house and open the door Milo Ran in faster than anything and began sniffing around the house he then ran upstairs and begin barking at the bedroom door, Kylie ignored Milo and continued to bring boxes in the house.

As darkness fell upon the house Milo was still upstairs but no longer barking at the bedroom door, he stood there like a guard dog trying to get in then eventually fell asleep.
Kyle had to refer to sleeping on the floor The furniture would not arrive until the next day Kyle got into his sleeping bag and fell asleep...
1.title: Moving day

choices: A thief looking for something to steal
The yellow fox he saw from his dreams
No one there, but Kyle keep searching
No one there, and Kyle decides to go back to bed
A strange device resting on the table
13.content:
Kyle stood on the edge of what looked like a lake covered and mist, across the river he saw a shady figure he couldn't quite make it out though.

Kyle awoke with sweat tickling down his face,
"what was that all about?"Kyle said confused

Later that day the furniture arrived with the TV and The bed, then came the bedframe, The lamps, and all the other stuff, by late noon Kyle had successfully moved into his new house, The movers drove away casually as Kyle watch them drive off over the hill.
Milo was still in front of the left bedroom door he been there all day and did not move from that spot like a determined guard dog he stood there glancing up at the door as if waiting for something or someone to come out Kyle still didn't pay any mind and went about unpacking boxes.
As the day rolled into night Kyle got ready to go to bed but he felt as if he was being watched by something.
"it's probably nothing it's an old house anyway"Kyle thought to himself as he fell asleep

Kyle once again stood at the edge of the mysterious lake covered in mist, Again Kyle saw the shady figure it was a little clearer now but he still couldn't make it out.

Kyle woke that morning covered in sweat,
"Shit again?" Kyle said "what the Hell is going on here?"

Three days pasted and Kyle still had the same dream, by the fourth time he went to bed it looked like he was having the same dream but this time was different The figure was much much clearer and he could finally make it out, it was a huge two legged yellow fox, the fox started coming towards Kyle, Kyle was really scared, but what could he do? He couldn't run his legs wouldn't let him, the fox was now standing right in front of Kyle, Kyle didn't have time to observe the fox before he knew it the fox placed it's paw on Kyle's head, suddenly Kyle felt heavy he felt his eyes begin to close as he blacked out.

Suddenly, Kyle awoke to noises coming from downstairs, Kyle grab a gun he had hidden in his sock drawer used only against intruders, he also grabbed a flashlight,
"Milo come on boy"Kyle whispered as he walked downstairs he saw
13.title: Just a dream, Right?

info.brief_description: My story is set two years after the second one, it features Kain's twin brother Kyle
info.description:
It's been two years since Kain disappeared.

Kyle is a 25-year-old (who is also Ex-military) trying to start a new life at his brothers old house but once he moves in he finds out it's not as empty as he thinks, then goes on an adventure to find out what happened to his brother.

I give credit to Skye and his story, "Captured by Giant Renamon"
Also to Kain and his story "Captured by Giant Renamon(Male version)

I use their characters names as a reference and as main characters themselves

Before we begin let me lay down some rules

1: no sex scenes (yes this is rated 18+ But that's Mostly due to the swearing) but smothering with any part of the body is okay just keep it to a minimum.
2: other human or nonhuman characters are allowed, just don't draw the attention away from the main heroes.
3: use proper grammar and spelling (A little spelling mistake it's okay)
4: The main heroes can't die (it may be awkward but this is my story so please respect that).
5: Have your own unique twists and turns.

And with that let's begin
